extensionAttribute.description:
Written by Neil Martin - 2018-12-01
This Extension Attribute returns the license activation status for ESET Endpoint Antivirus.
Returns "Activated" if licensed, "Unactivated" if not licensed and "Not Installed" if ESET Antivirus is not installed.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
esets_daemon="/Applications/ESET Endpoint Antivirus.app/Contents/MacOS/esets_daemon"
if [[ -e "$esets_daemon" ]]; then esetactstatus=$("$esets_daemon" --status | grep Activation | cut -d "=" -f 2) echo "<result>$esetactstatus</result>" exit 0 else echo "<result>Not Installed</result>" fi
exit 0
